1110000100101100 1110001110111010 1 -> sum: 1100010011100111, cout: 1
0110001111111010 0001001101110101 1 -> sum: 0111011101110000, cout: 0
1010011001100011 1111110101011001 0 -> sum: 1010001110111100, cout: 1

1001010010011111 1000101101101001 0 -> sum: 0010000000001000, cout: 1
0001110011001111 0000110011111111 0 -> sum: 0010100111001110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
